name: 钢铁震王
description: 地下世界的守护者，全身由稀有金属构成。它的移动会引起小型地震，是矿物的化身。

features: 全身覆盖厚重的钢铁铠甲
头部有钻石硬度的尖角

image_prompts.design: A massive armored beast covered in heavy steel armor. Diamond-hard horn on head, claws that can cut any rock, produces shockwaves when walking. Low poly style with faceted geometric surfaces, sharp edges on armor plates, ink sketch texture on metal patterns, non-reflective surface with matte dark steel tones, unstoppable underground guardian.
